class_a_02_ecology_01_old_00:
Hello, hello. I hope everyone’s ready to learn
some new things today![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_02_old_00:
Did you all try using the ZR Button to let your
Pokémon out as I taught you in our last class?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_03:
Walking along with your Pokémon lets you see
how unique and cute they all are.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_04:
I’d also highly recommend picnics for when you
want to spend some quality time together with\r
the Pokémon in your party.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_05:
You can get them all around the table to make
sandwiches and play—it’s really a lot of fun![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_06:
If you want to learn more about making food,
Mr. Saguaro’s class is the best place to go![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_07:
Now, sometimes, while you’re enjoying a picnic
with your Pokémon...[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_08:
you may find something very, VERY important in
the basket next to your table![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_09:
This very important something is what Pokémon
are born from. Let’s all say it together![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_answer_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Huh? Um...[VAR TRNAME(0000)], it looks
like\r
you’re\r
the\r
only\r
one\r
who\r
said Boxes.\c
We sometimes send Pokémon to Boxes for
safekeeping, but they’re not born from them! [VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_answer_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Huh? Um...[VAR TRNAME(0000)], it looks
like\r
you’re\r
the\r
only\r
one\r
who\r
said\r
Poké Balls!\c
I don’t believe there have been any Pokémon
discovered yet that are born from Poké Balls![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_answer_03: Phew! You all got it right![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_10:
The very important something I’m talking about
is...a Pokémon Egg![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_11:
It’s not clear where these Eggs come from, but
they’re probably placed in the basket rather\r
stealthily by the Pokémon at the picnic.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_12:
Walking around with an Egg will help warm it,
which allows it to hatch.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_13:
Eggs won’t warm up by sitting in Boxes, though.
You need to have them in your party![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_14:
And here’s one more super important thing I’d
like you to remember about Eggs.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_15:
Pokémon entrust us with their Eggs because they
believe in us![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_16:
So, I sure would be happy to see you all being
responsible parents for your little Pokémon Eggs![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_02_ecology_17:
Whoops. My most important point came right as
the bell rang. Well, see you all next time, I guess![VAR 0114(002A)]
